c2a3207036fbecf024e3113fad8b8320.humanReadablePath: Board > translation block comments > index-0 > text

724bf4507b30d538c01a79b44e2ad9b4.humanReadablePath: Board > translation block comments > index-0 > text
724bf4507b30d538c01a79b44e2ad9b4.originalText: Alternatively you can import the board class as from a subdirectory; this shaves the bundle size a bit but not a lot though. As the board is the overall entry point for the library.

dbff56c3adff15937e3a4c616cbb5e43.humanReadablePath: Board > alignCoordinateSystem > alignCoordinateSystem > translation block comments > index-0 > text
dbff56c3adff15937e3a4c616cbb5e43.originalText: This is an attribute that determines if the coordinate system should be aligned with the one of the HTML canvas element. The default is true.

8cd6596da16f2d726f0c87106fec2965.humanReadablePath: Board > camera > camera > translation block comments > index-0 > text
8cd6596da16f2d726f0c87106fec2965.originalText:
The underlying camera of the board. The camera of the board can be switched.
The boundaries are based on camera. Meaning you can have camera with different boundaries, and you can switch between them during runtime.

f4e84488dd7165b79872ea301353b47b.humanReadablePath: Board > context > context > translation block comments > index-0 > text
f4e84488dd7165b79872ea301353b47b.originalText: The context used to draw stuff on the canvas.

e917124509b3ba78366883d19f9d8b20.humanReadablePath: Board > controlCenter > controlCenter > translation block comments > index-0 > text
e917124509b3ba78366883d19f9d8b20.originalText:
The control center of the board. The control center is responsible for handling the input events and dispatch the events to the pan, zoom, and rotation handlers.
This exists to decouple the input events from the camera. The control center is the middle man. The default control center is just a simple relay. You can implement a control center
that takes in other inputs. For example, an input to start camera animations.

e1c930ccd49420aecded6ad5da283233.humanReadablePath: Board > fullScreen > fullScreen > translation block comments > index-0 > text
e1c930ccd49420aecded6ad5da283233.originalText:
Determines if the board should be full screen. If this is set to true, the width and height of the board will be set to the window's inner width and inner height respectively.
If set to true the width and height of the board will resize with the window.

7ef684398a2511e57753e9ed513cbd06.humanReadablePath: Board > height > height > translation block comments > index-0 > text
7ef684398a2511e57753e9ed513cbd06.originalText:
This is in sync with the canvas height and the camera view port height. This is not the board's height.
If the limitEntireViewPort is set to true, the min zoom level is updated based on the height.

72a8e6a111f036cc45acf354be4413fa.humanReadablePath: Board > kmtStrategy > kmtStrategy > translation block comments > index-0 > text
72a8e6a111f036cc45acf354be4413fa.originalText:
The strategy used to handle the keyboard, mouse events. The default strategy is the DefaultBoardKMTStrategy. 
You can implement your own strategy by implementing the BoardKMTStrategy interface.

c12c8b7fa546e951809a4b0294732067.humanReadablePath: Board > limitEntireViewPort > limitEntireViewPort > translation block comments > index-0 > text
c12c8b7fa546e951809a4b0294732067.originalText:
Determines the behavior of the camera when the camera is at the edge of the boundaries. If set to true, the entire view port would not move beyond the boundaries.
If set to false, only the center of the camera is bounded by the boundaries.

2261fd4090519266152607e6d9f1de2f.humanReadablePath: Board > maxHalfTransHeight > maxHalfTransHeight > translation block comments > index-0 > text
2261fd4090519266152607e6d9f1de2f.originalText: The max translation height of the camera. This is the maximum distance the camera can move in the vertical direction.

4e33a1f8c620365a397c6219c3e5ba13.humanReadablePath: Board > maxHalfTransWidth > maxHalfTransWidth > translation block comments > index-0 > text
4e33a1f8c620365a397c6219c3e5ba13.originalText: The max translation width of the camera. This is the maximum distance the camera can move in the horizontal direction.

a812cd9b6eccc1c4aec0b6aae01e0c5b.humanReadablePath: Board > touchStrategy > touchStrategy > translation block comments > index-0 > text
a812cd9b6eccc1c4aec0b6aae01e0c5b.originalText:
The strategy used to handle touch events. The default strategy is the DefaultTouchStrategy.
You can implement your own strategy by implementing the BoardTouchStrategy interface.

25f3421bc51f8bf5fb3e37a50dd1d2ed.humanReadablePath: Board > width > width > translation block comments > index-0 > text
25f3421bc51f8bf5fb3e37a50dd1d2ed.originalText:
This is in sync with the canvas width and the camera view port width. This is not the board's width.
If the limitEntireViewPort is set to true, the min zoom level is updated based on the width of the canvas.

72e7ae8bf2c7958bbd3ff8977d3fe59a.humanReadablePath: Board > convertWindowPoint2WorldCoord > convertWindowPoint2WorldCoord > translation block comments > index-0 > text
72e7ae8bf2c7958bbd3ff8977d3fe59a.originalText: Converts a point from window coordinates to world coordinates.

37e7382fec78e9296f7e5d1670859e35.humanReadablePath: Board > on > on > translation block comments > index-0 > text
37e7382fec78e9296f7e5d1670859e35.originalText: Add an camera movement event listener. The events are "pan", "zoom", and "rotate".

91ddc5a8b75dd4575fdd7d07441b73bc.humanReadablePath: Board > onInput > onInput > translation block comments > index-0 > text
91ddc5a8b75dd4575fdd7d07441b73bc.originalText:
Add an input event listener. The events are "pan", "zoom", and "rotate". This is different from the camera event listener as this is for input events. 
Input event does not necesarily mean that the camera will move. The input event is the event that is triggered when the user interacts with the board.

5622305e0982f0abeb4b1571404a7854.humanReadablePath: Board > setup > setup > translation block comments > index-0 > text
5622305e0982f0abeb4b1571404a7854.originalText: This function is used to set up the board. It adds all the event listeners and starts the resize observer and the attribute observer.

a2eb2215f485738d83d953cc16810df0.humanReadablePath: Board > step > step > translation block comments > index-0 > text
a2eb2215f485738d83d953cc16810df0.originalText: This is the step function that is called in the animation frame. This function is responsible for updating the canvas context and the camera state.

7123ecdbdb037acff9e35b78b2d7fd3b.humanReadablePath: Board > tearDown > tearDown > translation block comments > index-0 > text
7123ecdbdb037acff9e35b78b2d7fd3b.originalText: This function is used to clean up the board. It removes all the event listeners and disconnects the resize observer and the attribute observer.

a309e160ef3ed2f384c3d9bf1cc70ce9.humanReadablePath: InputObserver > translation block comments > index-0 > text
a309e160ef3ed2f384c3d9bf1cc70ce9.originalText: This is the observer class that listens to input events and notifies the control center.
